document.full_text: the former executive vice president and general counsel for children's hospital of philadelphia was accused of embezzling $1.7 million from the prestigious facility, authorities said on thursday.
document.title: former philadelphia hospital executive accused of embezzling
lines_and_colors: the former executive vice president and general counsel for children's hospital of philadelphia was accused of embezzling $1.7 million from the prestigious facility, authorities said on thursday.
